name: Dolse & gabbana
description: One of the most recognizable names in ready-to-wear fashion, the Dolce and Gabbana brand is Italian flair at its finest.

name: Gorgeo Armani
description: There are success stories and there are renowned businesses, but only a few of them can go about building a business empire, like Giorgio Armani.

name: Burberry
description: Burberry was founded by Thomas Burberry in 1856. He went on to invent a fabric called gabardine, which was then patented by the company.

name: Azzaro
description: Loris Azzaro started his line of clothing and fragrances in 1962. Although from Tunisia, he set up business in Paris, France.

name: Joop
description: When German designer Wolfang Joop launched 'JOOP!' in the late 70s, he hoped the name would grab some eyeballs, and set the brand apart

name: Royal Copenhagen
description: A Danish manufacturer of porcelain, Royal Copenhagen (Royal Porcelain Factory) was established in 1775 and had its first headquarters in Copenhagen.
